channel.title: layer on Blockchain Daily
channel.description: Recent content in layer on Blockchain Daily

item.title: Crypto Update NEWS 2022-03-08
item.description: Binance Sets Up Fiat-to-Crypto Payments Provider, Lends to FCA-Regulated Custodian (2 minute read) Binance set up its own fiat-to-crypto payments provider to help businesses become crypto-ready.

item.title: Crypto Update NEWS 2022-03-03
item.description: Dialect Raises $4.1M to Bring ‘Smart Messaging’ to Solana (2 minute read) Dialect is a smart messaging platform on Solana that enables notifications and wallet-to-wallet chat.

item.title: Crypto Update NEWS 2022-02-24
item.description: StarkWare Launches Layer 2 Product StarkNet on Ethereum (1 minute read) StarkWare’s StarkNet layer 2 protocol is ready for the deployment of decentralized apps.
